response.overview: Known as the world's greatest airlift, this heroic mission by the Western allies delivered over 2 million- plus tons of supplies to 2 million citizens of war-torn Berlin in 1948. Lasting 15 months the operation involved over 277,000 flights, 300 aircraft and countless personnel. Featuring rare historical footage and insightful interviews you'll experience the harsh realities of survival after war.
response.title: The World's Greatest Airlift - Berlin 1948
